Class JavaStubCompilationUnit

  • java.lang.Object

        • org.codehaus.groovy.tools.javac.JavaStubCompilationUnit

  • public class JavaStubCompilationUnit
extends CompilationUnit
    Compilation unit to only generate stubs.
